Module com.fastwriting
Package com.fastwriting.model

Class GameModel

java.lang.Object
com.fastwriting.model.GameModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGameInterface
public class GameModel extends Object implements IGameInterface
The model class representing the state of the typing game. It manages game logic such as the current level, time, player's score, and game status.

  • Constructor Summary

    GameModel()
    Constructs a new GameModel and initializes the game state.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameModel

      public GameModel()
      Constructs a new GameModel and initializes the game state. Sets the initial level, starts the game, and resets scores and timers.

  • Method Details

    • isInputIsCorrect

      public boolean isInputIsCorrect(String input)
      Checks if the user's input matches a phrase from the current level.
      Specified by:
      isInputIsCorrect in interface IGameInterface
      Parameters:
      input - The text entered by the user.
      Returns:
      true if the input is a correct phrase for the current level, false otherwise.

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Starts the game session by setting the game status to playing.
      Specified by:
      startGame in interface IGameInterface

    • levelUp

      public void levelUp()
      Advances the game to the next level. It increments the level and the success count. Every 5 levels, it decreases the available time by 2 seconds.
      Specified by:
      levelUp in interface IGameInterface

    • getIsPlaying

      public boolean getIsPlaying()
      Gets the current playing status of the game.
      Specified by:
      getIsPlaying in interface IGameInterface
      Returns:
      true if the game is currently running, false otherwise.

    • getPlayerIsWin

      public boolean getPlayerIsWin()
      Checks if the player has won the game. The player wins when they reach a level greater than 41.
      Specified by:
      getPlayerIsWin in interface IGameInterface
      Returns:
      true if the player has won, false otherwise.
